name: Ape Meets King - Godzilla 1962
description:
King Kong vs. Godzilla (キングコング対ゴジラ Kingu Kongu Tai Gojira?, lit. King Kong Against Godzilla) is a 1962 tokusatsu kaiju film produced by Toho Company Ltd., the third installment in the Godzilla series, as well as the Showa series. The film was released to Japanese theaters on August 11, 1962, and to American theaters on June 26, 1963.
King Kong vs. Godzilla was directed by Ishiro Honda, who returned after his absence during the production of Godzilla Raids Again. The film was produced by Tomoyuki Tanaka and John Beck, while Shinichi Sekizawa, Willis O'Brien, and George Worthing Yates served as its writers. The film's plot centers around the return of Godzilla and his subsequent confrontation with King Kong.
